dict.acceptation: 杯子；一杯（的量）；（胸罩的）罩杯；优胜杯；
使（手）窝成杯状；使（双手）成圆状托起；为…拔火罐；

sent.orig: Folling cup,infilling,setting cup,final eucapsulation,acuing cup,transferring cup all be finished by automatic.
sent.trans: 落杯、充填、放盖、封口、顶杯、输杯均自动完成，自动化程度高。

sent.orig: In 1998, of course, we won the League Cup and European Cup Winners' Cup.
sent.trans: 当然，在1998年我们赢得了联赛杯和欧洲优胜者杯，这实在光荣。

sent.orig: The utility model discloses a lock cup, which comprises a cup body and a cup cover.
sent.trans: 本实用新型公开了一种密码锁杯，它由杯体和杯盖构成，杯盖的侧面有插销，杯体的侧面有插孔。

sent.orig: In the Asia Cup and Cup qualifiers, the Football were divided into Group of Death.
sent.trans: 在亚洲杯和世界杯预选赛上，国足均被分进死亡之组。

sent.orig: The main international competitions are the All-England Badminton Championships, the Thomas Cup, and the Uber Cup.
sent.trans: 主要的国际比赛有全英羽毛球锦标赛，汤姆斯杯赛和尤伯杯赛。
